tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:a white female aged 78 yrs complains of recurrent mild increased thirst over the past month. The pt reports severe increased hunger, mild frequent urination. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 163 cm, Weight 49.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, Pelvic = no tenderness or mass, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, obese with NAD a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed LANTUS - 100 UNITS/ML subcutaneous daily, and ordered HbA1c.

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:patient presents with critical bloody vomiting, critical chest pain and critical cough for 5 days. patient is a 78 yr old white female retired. o:Height 164 cm, Weight 51.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, Patient appears very tired and pale a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:a 78 yr old white F presents with 9 months history of critical chest pain, critical bloody vomiting, Stomach. patient reports critical cough. she denies drinking alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 164 cm, Weight 50.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Lymphatics = firm, immobile, non tender left supraclavicular lymph node a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Esomeprazole - 20 mg IV qd x 10 days, and ordered transthoracic esophagectomy - esophagus.

td.content: s:a 79 YO F retired says she is having symptoms of severe increased hunger 10-11 times a week, mostly during the day. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 49.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, Pelvic = no tenderness or mass, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, obese with NAD a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed LANTUS - 100 UNITS/ML subcutaneous daily, and ordered Glucose, Serum.
